notes: Demo-only thresholds; do not represent any real network program.
Use internal KB as source-of-truth for this training.

05.label: Do Not Honor
general_guidance: Issuer declined; ask customer to contact issuer.
Retry may succeed after issuer confirmation.

57.label: Transaction Not Permitted
general_guidance: May indicate issuer restrictions or merchant category limits.
Consider step-up auth or alternate channel.

91.label: Issuer or switch inoperative
general_guidance: Retry after a short interval; monitor for spikes.

kb_snippets.title: Handling a sudden spike in decline code 05 (Do Not Honor)
content: Confirm whether declines are concentrated to specific issuers/countries.
Check acquirer routing changes, BIN routing, and recent config deployments.
If spike coincides with a time window, escalate to payments-ops channel with evidence.

kb_snippets.title: Step-up authentication recommendations
content: If risk band is High and 3DS is not enabled or failing frequently, recommend enabling 3DS or improving challenge flow.
Consider velocity checks and device fingerprinting for high-risk digital goods.

kb_snippets.title: Chargeback remediation playbook
content: Reduce fraud via stronger auth and screening.
Improve descriptor and customer support responsiveness.
Review refund policy and improve cancellation flows for travel merchants.

when_to_escalate: Large-scale decline spikes (>20% decline rate in last 6 hours).
High risk band + repeated approvals without step-up auth for high-risk segment merchants.
